Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-58183 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-58183 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.14.2-13, affected by CVE-2025-58183
